title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 57.19 - Special requirements for library and experimental gene pool flocks found positive for salmonella enteritidis
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 57.19 - Special requirements for library and experimental gene pool flocks found positive for salmonella enteritidis

State Regulations

If any of the environmental, blood and/or culture samples
taken from such flocks test positive for Salmonella enteritidis, eggs from such
flocks shall not be used for human consumption and the flocks shall be
maintained in strict isolation until the infection is eliminated from the
remaining birds and has been eliminated from their
environment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
57.19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
